name: Fantasy and Science Fiction
description: Breaking the rules of reality, creating magical or futuristic technological scenarios, satisfying the desire for unknown worlds and extraordinary imagination.

groups.name: Magic World
groups.description: A fantasy realm woven with spells and magic.

groups.name: Dragons and Knights
groups.description: Epic scenes of dragons and heroes clashing in medieval legends.

groups.name: Medieval Fantasy
groups.description: A world of swords and magic built by elves, dwarves, and dragons.

groups.name: Intergalactic War
groups.description: Interstellar battles between star fleets and advanced technologies.

groups.name: Future City
groups.description: The urban landscape of towering skyscrapers and advanced technology.

groups.name: Space Exploration
groups.description: Spacecraft venturing into the universe, seeking unknown planets and life.

groups.name: Alien Civilization
groups.description: Imagined extraterrestrial species and societal structures.

groups.name: Spacecraft
groups.description: Diverse spaceship designs and interstellar travel scenarios.

groups.name: Steampunk
groups.description: A retro-futuristic blend of Victorian era and steam power.

groups.name: Cyberpunk
groups.description: Neon lights, hackers, and a highly advanced network world.

groups.name: Superhero
groups.description: Heroes with special abilities or extraordinary skills.

groups.name: Time Travel
groups.description: Traveling through the past or future, changing history or exploring the unknown.

groups.name: Virtual Reality
groups.description: Digital simulations and immersive experiences in a virtual world.

groups.name: Mechanical Robots
groups.description: Humanoid mechs or intelligent robots in combat and cooperation.

groups.name: Parallel Universe
groups.description: Multiple independent yet interconnected dimensions.

groups.name: Post-Apocalyptic Wasteland
groups.description: A barren survival environment after global collapse.

groups.name: AI Technology
groups.description: Highly advanced artificial intelligence, human-machine interaction, and conflict.

groups.name: Cosmic Monsters
groups.description: Giant monsters wreaking havoc on Earth or in the universe.

groups.name: Space Colony
groups.description: Human settlements established on other planets.

groups.name: Fictional Creatures
groups.description: Exotic flora and fauna not found in reality.

groups.name: Future Warriors
groups.description: Elite forces equipped with advanced mechs or weapons.

groups.name: Elven Kingdom
groups.description: A mystical and elegant community of fantastical beings and magical ecosystems.

groups.name: Alien Landscapes
groups.description: Unique planetary surfaces and surreal vistas.

groups.name: Mechanical Fantasy
groups.description: A world heavily mechanized, with metallic undertones.
